divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside to a cig I was facing south looked up there was an airplane just passing bye heading due east I turned to my right looking due west noticed a very bright orange light traveling due south east so I reached inside the door grabed my little binoculars I observed this object moving through the sky could not make out any shape just a bright ball of light.conditon of skies hazey with some high thin clouds I watched this object for approx.30 seconds then it just simply was gone !
